explains: v. 托付，委托；吐露，倾诉
wordGroup: confide in 信任，信赖；向…吐露秘密

sentences.en: It is important to have someone you can confide in.
sentences.cn: 有一位心腹知己很重要。

sentences.en: It is important that an adolescent boy should have an adult in whom he can confide.
sentences.cn: 一个青春期男孩应该有一个他能倾吐心声的成年人，这是很重要的。

sentences.en: Did you confide it to Our Lord?
sentences.cn: 你把这事告诉我们的上帝了吗？
